definitions.definition: A point of a connected space whose removal causes the resulting space to be disconnected .
examples: Every point of a line is a cutpoint , but no point of a circle is a cutpoint.

definitions.definition: A cutoff point; a threshold value .

main_definition: ( topology ) A point of a connected space whose removal causes the resulting space to be disconnected .
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) A cutoff point; a threshold value .
